tool.name: Merge SBML
tool.description: Merge two SBML or a collection of SBML to another SBML file
tool.help:
Merge SBML ==========
Merge two SBML files
Input -----
Required:
* **-sourcefile**\ : (string) Path to the input file of SBML model(s) that will be merged into the target SBML * **-target_sbml**\ : (string) Path to the target SBML file * **-inout_format**\ : (string) The input/output file type out (valid: [sbml, tar])
Output ------
* **-output**\ : (string) Path to the output file
